SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

se.nicklasgavelin.sphero
Class Robot

java.lang.Object
  se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.Robot

public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object

Robot class. Mirrors the direct connection between the application and the Sphero robot. Contains some macro commands to perform simple direct commands. It's also possible to create commands and send them directly using the Robot.sendCommand method. Commands may be sent with time delays or periodicity. Example usage: Robot r = new Robot( ); r.connect(); r.sendCommand( new FrontLEDCommand( 0.5F ) );

Version:
1.2 TODO: Set temporary internal values on sending commands so that we don't update them too late if we send multiple commands
Author:
Nicklas Gavelin, nicklas.gavelin@gmail.com, Lule√• University of Technology

Robot

public Robot(BluetoothDevice bt)
      throws InvalidRobotAddressException,
             RobotBluetoothException
Create a robot from a Bluetooth device. You need to call Robot.connect after creating a robot to connect to it via the Bluetooth connection given.

Parameters:
bt - The Bluetooth device that represents the robot
Throws:
InvalidRobotAddressException - throws RobotBluetoothException

connect

public boolean connect()
Connect to the robot via the Bluetooth connection given in the constructor. Will NOT throw any exceptions if connection fails.

Returns:
True if connection succeeded, false otherwise

connect

public boolean connect(boolean throwException)
Connect with a possible chance of getting an exception thrown if the connection fails.

Parameters:
throwException - True to throw exception, false otherwise
Returns:
True if connected, will throw exception if not connected
Throws:
RobotInitializeConnectionFailed - Thrown if throwException is set to true and initialization failed

Disconnect from the robot (closes all streams and Bluetooth connections, also closes down all internal threads).

cancelSendCommandAfterMacro

public void cancelSendCommandAfterMacro()
Stops the commands entered to be sent after the macro is finished running. To send new commands they have to be re-entered into the sendCommandAfterMacro method.

                                float initialDelay,
                                float periodLength)
Send a command infinite times with a certain initial delay and a certain given period length between next-coming messages.

Parameters:
command - The command to send
initialDelay - The initial delay before the first message is sent (in milliseconds)
periodLength - The length between the transmissions

rgbTransition

public void rgbTransition(java.awt.Color from,
                          java.awt.Color to,
                          int steps)
Creates a transition between two different colors with a number of changes between the colors (the transition itself). The delay between each step is set to 25 ms.

Parameters:
from - The color to go from
to - The color to end up with
steps - The number of steps to take between the change between the two colors

rgbTransition

public void rgbTransition(int fRed,
                          int fGreen,
                          int fBlue,
                          int tRed,
                          int tGreen,
                          int tBlue,
                          int steps)
Creates a transition between two different colors with a number of changes between the colors (the transition itself). The delay between each color shift is set to 25 ms.

Parameters:
fRed - The initial red color value
fGreen - The initial green color value
fBlue - The initial blue color value
tRed - The final red color value
tGreen - The final green color value
tBlue - The final blue color value
steps - Number of steps to take (The number of times to change color until reaching the final color)

dDelay - Delay between the color shifts

public void jumpToBootloader()
Jump the robot to the bootloader part. NOTICE: THE DEVICE CONNETION WILL DISCONNECT WHEN THE ROBOT JUMPS TO THE BOOTLOADER!

sleep

public void sleep(int time)
Send a sleep command to the robot. The sleep time is given in seconds.

Parameters:
time - Number of seconds to sleep. The connection WILL be LOST to the robot and have to be re-initialized.

resetHeading

public void resetHeading()
Resets the robots motorHeading. Sends a roll command with current velocity and motorStop value and also a calibrate command to reset the motorHeading.

public void sendCommand(MacroObject macro)
Send a macro to the Sphero device. If the macro mode is set to Normal either a RunMacroCommand has to be sent or you have to run .playMacro on the Robot instance

Parameters:
macro - The macro to send to the Sphero
